name: durably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is able to last and be used for a long time without becoming damaged: All our products are made cheaply but durably from wood and aluminium. The new edition of the book is printed on better paper and more durably bound than the original.
in a way that is able to continue to exist for a long time: It's a film that is funny enough to be durably entertaining. Their main aim is to create a durably successful economy. Synonym
enduringly
More examplesFewer examplesThe cooking pots are durably made from stainless steel.This storage system will durably store all your original files.He directed some of the most durably popular films of all time.
